The new eats driver app has been improved and functions better now. I can't say the same for their pay structure. unlike other delivery apps that suggest a customer tip at checkout, Uber's app doesn't prompt customers to tip until the NEXT time they log into the app. I get very few tips yet I'm a 100% 5 star rated driver. on top of the lack of tipping, Uber has taken all quests away and left my state with a single tiny boost area cramming every driver in the state into a very small area.

As a new driver i have been using the app for Uber Eats deliveries for a few weeks now. Nice to haves: - A permanent current speed display alongside the speed limit. - An audible over speed limit alongside the red flashing. Bugs encountered: - In night time mode, when reporting thumbs down for restaurant and delivery, the options when slected are light making it hard to see which options you've chosen. - Navigation to a boost location is not in my chosen metric units, it teverts to imperial.

What happened Uber?? I started working for Uber Eats back in May. Pay was decent  and  being able to work your own hours was great. However, just recently, Uber has jacked up the delivery prices for those ordering food by almost triple the amount of what it used to be. This means drivers get tipped less. Uber has also stopped doing bonus hours (which is what makes the pay decent) everywhere except two places, which are nowhere near me. This means I make about $3/delivery now instead of $8 or $9.

The previous version gave better Maps directions as well as reporting was phenomenal the new I'm not sure about over I don't know if they even know what they're doing now I load the app it's in November and the old app loads who knows what he was doing next all I know is they have no idea. as of January 2019 the app is still riddled with problems and I'm not getting any trip request my suggestion don't drive for Uber at this time

everything was great, lots of small little jobs here to there, usually no more than 10 miles, every now and then i get a notification of a rider and am told "possible premium pick up" but i see no difference in the pay. I'll drive an extra 20 minutes just to pick up this person to take them 7 miles..... recently, especially today, i have had to log off then back on because the app keeps trying to put me in the airport queue when i am no where close to the airport. please fix this problem soon!

Need location tracking and quick updating on live riding while turning the vehicle. doesnt get me any deliveries for hours...i dont know what is the point of even going to online. i have a car account for uber eats delivery...either and get a delivery with pickup range 5 to 10km and delivery range 5 to 10km or no deliveries for hours. this is not fair and guys these need to be changed. need to distribute deliveries equally or stop your service.

Previously, the app worked fine. I was forced to get a new phone because my old one died. New phone is a Pixel 3 XL. App will not let me go online. I've been getting the same answer feom customer service for a week. "We're working on it and we've forwarded the issue to our engineers." SAME ANSWER, every time...

Glitches and trreats drivers like dogs. fails to call or notice drivers when complaints are made. policies on validating compl aintscwith camera footage or police reports of drug tests are one nation wide issue for drivers. the biggest failure for uber is failing to some service as well as well as retain drivers. they allow people who were canceled to make false reports and never road in cars. also do not suspend riders forvfalse reports. failed to prevent minors from using system. what a joke.

worst ever in pakistan.your management team is based on montessori kids. without any evidence u guys deduct payments from driver account if one of rider falsely accuse us. shame on you guys a lot of shame. please growup and make your system like careem maybe u need to learn from them

Why it takes forever for the review of my app access on airport trip unfounded violation on one AIRPORT then it affects the other too... i haven't received any update yet on my app. i think when it comes standing with driver that is where we need more, we are letting this cab company influence our presence in the airport. This not only me who have this issue so please help us restore our access and if we really have citation then so be it but if not stand for us and help us.

NSW Police advised that it is clearly illegal to touch any part of a mobile phone whilst the vehicle is in motion even if the phone is in a holder. The vehicle must be switched off with keys out of the ignition to accept a rideshare trip. RSDAA are advising all rideshare drivers to take caution until this issue has been finalised. Under current NSW Police laws it is illegal to use any rideshare app whilst keys are in ignition. RSDAA can confirm that it is impossible for drivers to use rideshare

Wonderful opportunities and excellent pay if you are willing to put in the time and effort. App and GPS can be a little wonky at times but if you just use you intuition every now and then to think ahead about the trip pick ups and drop off locations you should never have an issue with finding your riders.

all good apart from the navigation. ur roads etc are not upto date and get sent down one way roads or dead ends. not clear and precise. you need to have google apps as a default WITHOUT having to take you out off uber app to go onto Google maps. should be implemented on the uber app itself.

I'm actually giving my review as s a Uber Partner .I have not used the new app because I haven't been driving for about two months. My car was damaged on the inside by a rider and I was told to use my own car insurance. I reached out several times to Uber to no avail. I wrote the CEO and I NEVER RECEIVED A RESPONSE FROM HIM! This has been going on since SEPTEMBER 2018!

uber rating system terrible... 4.6 or less and driver gets fired yet this not explained to riders! drivers have to leave rating immediately at dropoff yet riders dont rate till next booking usually when they are drunk and angry later that night when trying to book pickup. I also have no feedback so i know how to improve or even what was riders issue. another issue is what vehicle they are booking needs to be clearly shown... I drive a new truck and many clients are surprised when a truck shows up

The app is working right now, but the rating system is a joke. I have 3 one star ratings and I have done nothing to deserve these types of ratings. There is no feedback whatsoever from the passengers who are supposedly giving me these ratings. It is a complete joke that these are messing with my overall rating and nothing is being done about it. This is my job and i take all my jobs very seriously. When I called into the company I was told not to worry about, but i do because my job depends on it

Sucks. I have driven in Ft. Collins CO for 4 years so I know my way around town very well. Uber's in app navigation is so flawed it is a joke. This version is so out of date it is useless and prone to get someone unfamiliar with the city in trouble. It is very big on U turns where a simple left turn will do. I hate the navigation portion, the rest is fine, except for the tipping/rating system. The rider should be prompted at the end of the trip, same as the driver.

Read all the people's comments having the same issues which are already mentioned. Fix the problem don't just let people experience the same things which are not suitable for drivers. All the profits are coming from the drivers on the road staying long hours on the app. For me Friday and Saturday nights were very busy before but now have to wait for hours on line to get a trip. Just fix all the problems which is already mentioned. Make the drivers HAPPY.

Hi, The app sometimes disconnects and I'm not getting any trips. After that happened I went offline. 2 days later I wanted to ride again so I started the app and it says that my driving limit has been reached even-though the app was off for 2 days with no visible notification. Error reporting in the app is also not working as there is no option to add an error report - so I write here. Can you please fix that? Thanks.

But thanks for the useless suggestion.

not working right at all its all screwy i worked 8 hours today and only made 58 dollars and in reality i spent 15 on gas so i really made 43 dollars not worth it any more i dont even wamt to give a star its really. a negative star i want to give it but in order to post you have to give a star .

You will get false and absurd messages, like "you're in a busy area, expect trips soon" It doesn't matter if you are in downtown, Carlsbad or Escondido. You could be between San Clemente and Oceanside, in the middle of the desert and it will be the same absurd and false message.!!!!!!

Bait and switch. Where do I begin? When Uber first came out they charge drivers a 20% Commission. Fast forward a few years later and it was a 25% Commission. Now due to the terms of service Uber can pay drivers whatever they wish to. 30% of the fair 40% of the fair 50% of the fair. Whatever they need to. In 2015 the rates in Charlotte we're cut from 1.25 per mile to .75 per mile. A rate cut of 40%? That's unacceptable. Fast forward to 2018 Uber is now raising the rates for the passengers, y

The new uber app is not so great sorry to say. I was driving to pick up a passenger that really wasn't that far. The uber app took me literally 17 min away from actual stop. I had to pull over to look at address, I'm glad that I looked at the address and recognized the area. The customer even called. I had another pickup after that and had to use my own GPS, so inconvenient and embarrassing. A few times the uber GPS would just stop directing. I have even tried restarting my phone still a no go.

horrible experience till date. It's not been a long time since I started with Uber eats as a driver partner. 2 days when people around me were getting decent number of deliveries I didn't get a single one even though I spent 2+ hours in a very high demand area. I tried from a different handset and I got 4 deliveries that evening and again the next whole day which was a Saturday I didn't get a single delivery. Absolutely frustrated.

once upon a time Ube was great. i could walk away with 700 or more without lifting a finger. then they hired everyone with a car who walked into a greenloght hub. now i am loosing money on gas and dealing with a broken app. almost a year now and i dont recommens uber to anyone. shame.

Don't work for them if you are a female. I was in a situation where a male wouldn't get out of my car and was making very clear sexual advances. I accepted a ride and my fare wasnt right the Uber rep said i shouldve took a picture and because i cant prove it they refused to pay it. They r holding my money at moment

appName: Resume Builder Free, CV Maker and Resume Templates

This is true when trying to upload directly it as a PDF as well as trying to upload it to another websites to convert it to another type of document. This makes this app virtually useless unless you're printing the resume. However, I've since learned that you must first download to your device before it will be recognized as a PDF.

appName: Glassdoor Job Search, Salaries and Reviews
comment: Notifies me way too much about stuff not even in my area. Changed settings and still get notifications every hour about things 50miles away. Otherwise a good app and good way to stay on the job hunt.

appName: Glassdoor Job Search, Salaries and Reviews
comment: Randomly deleted guideline compliant review on a company for no reason and without any warning. Glassdoor know on what side their bread is buttered. If sharing experiences and honest opinions was the name of the game in the beginning it clearly has changed. Nowadays it only exists for data mining, fake and manipulated reviews (management in same company is artificially boosting their ratings and when reported nothing was done about it) and to sell your personal data to the highest bidder. Even after clearly and unequivocally declaring I had no intent of receiving any sort of publicity or partner communications my inbox was flooded with spam about jobs that have nothing to do with my career and skills. Uninstalled and deleted account after years of trust and use.

appName: Glassdoor Job Search, Salaries and Reviews

Indeed is what you want. Forget wasting time with all the others. Indeed offers the best way to organize and get yourself out there. In less than a week I had multiple job interviews including several that contacted me after seeing my public resume. I didn't even have to apply, they came to me. If you need a job I wouldn't suggest wasting time with anything else. Upload your resume or create one on the app. I applied to 100 jobs in less than an hour. Get a better job, faster.
Indeed supplies me with a multitude of job information I love it

"QuickBooks Online" could stand to take a number of lessons from "Apple computers" regards to customer support. Anybody can tell you that making the transition from QuickBooks desktop to QuickBooks Online is extremely difficult process. what makes it even more difficult is the poor level of customer support, starting with communication barriers. there is a whole sect of business professionals that are unwilling to make the transition because of the learning curve and poor customer service.

a few glitches ie decimal place does not work when entering ammounts. does not allow me to enter the new 15% vat on expenses. and a few others I can't remember off hand .... but very nice and fairly easy system to work has reduced my paper work alot

Currently a subscriber to many QuickBooks services. Unfortunately, I am no longer able to access my account via the app on my mobile device after the latest update. Will update my rating if the issue can be remedied

Edit: update breaks login. This app lacks many of the important features of the web client. EVERY time I open it I end up either frustrated and switching to the web or the app literally tells me that what I am trying to do is only available in the web version. Web version tells me to try the app...?!!!? Whyste your time even coding the app if you aren't going to give it access to your accounting. You say I can work from anywhere, but I can't. I have to be at home on my PC, just like before. Overpriced trash.
First time using since update on 11-29. Will not let me login. Gives me error message. Too many times with app or web updates create major problems.

Great app and software! Just ran into problems though. Importing phone contacts is not working. had to update to continue using but scince it updated i cant login to my quickBooks account. I hate updates. I was happy with how it was going. I didn't want to update.

Please help

Does what it says and nothing else. Does not run in the background. Does not use data. I've left it installed since 2017 and it has not used data nor run in all that time and it is small. THIS is how simple single purpose apps should work. And stay. Simple. No bloat. No ads.
It's worth the time and effort you put into it... Thanks so much for the update and for the opportunity to meet real checks in the mail today

It's useless when it wont even let me use it. It claims my information doesn't match their records but it's not wrong. I've used the same information every damn year except my return amounts which aren't wrong either. I've triple checked.
BS file same information for the last 10 years. Don't know why it is talking so long. They get their money right away every 2 weeks. Just give me what is owed asap.

At first nothing but now it's saying I was excepted. However anyone with kids should be looking close to or on the 27th. Alot of you must be typing in the wrong info

The irs kept over $20k of mine - can you invest a few dollars of that to get decent developers?

Ppl if your refund has gotten intercepted by the IRS then it should going to tell you your information is wrong!! If you owe someone and know the amount you ow and input this information you will get better results!

I'm having the same problem I see others have, with it saying Im entering the wrong information when I know for sure I'm not. Frustrating! No matter the amount I enter, it is incorrect and won't let me see the status of my refund. Possibility of human error, yes, but I have all of my correct amounts. Whatever. I'm just being impatient.

Fyi if you are getting this message and try the website it does the same thing. So much for tracking a refund.
All my info is 10000% correct and it's just telling me my information entered does not match their records. Based on the reviews other people have had the same problem.

The app has never worked for me. I always put my information correctly, therefore that should not be the reason. I've just never had luck with it. Update the stars on my review when I can actually use it.

Put in all my correct information from my tax forms. It says I have to wait 4 weeks from date filed to get more info, that makes no sense. What's the point of this app? I'll have my return before that time, why would I want to check the status if it's already in my account?
great app no issues. for everyone having issues with it saying incorrect info. make sure u only enter your federal return not ur full refund amount

Works perfectly and quickly...just like using the "Where's My Refund?" on the IRS website. ..3 simple things to fill in...Social Security Number of primary filer, Filing Status, and exact amount of Federal refund from your tax return.

Makes it easier to track ya refund. . Oh @S.De.Jesus I had same problem. But I was putting in wrong amount. Put in the amount it says you will receive before any deductions are made, such as any debts, the place u may be paying whoever to file for you, exc. Just wanted to share this with you in hopes to help you.

ABSOLUTELY USELESS. Says info entered is wrong. My SS# is right, my status is right, my refund amount is right. There's only 3 dang questions...how could I be wrong? Uninstalled/installed 3x and gave up.
originally it kept saying information wrong. I've used this app on previous years, never had a problem...that I realized putting in full refund amount, not just Federal. Than it worked fine

Was working when I first downloaded it but now all it says is refunds won't be released until mid February for those that got the EIC or child tax, which is fine, I can wait, it just sucks that it won't tell u if ur refund has been approved or not like it used to, so if u got the child tax or EIC, dont even bother checking cuz the app is as useless as the IRS.

Well hate to break the chain of positive reviews but I submitted my info social security, amount of refund, and filing status ..keeps saying nothing matches. It's ALL ACCURATE...Filed my mj state taxes on Feb 7th still waiting.

It would be great if it actually worked. Instead it consistently tells me my information is incorrect. That's false. I know my filing status, refund amount, and social like the back of my hand. Thanks, Gov.

why does it just say "info not available at this time" for the the last damn 3 weeks??! I mean seriously?! you guys really don't have anyone to speak to at all? irs is ridiculously unprofessional. just give me my damn refund

appName: Docs To Go Free Office Suite
comment: *TRIED THE TOP 5 DOCUMENT APPS, including this, AND FOUND THESE OUT* PRO(S): Compared to its similar apps, it requires the LEAST SPACE in my phone storage, which is good in maintaining my phone's speed. A file that can be created with it has also a VERY SMALL SIZE. For example, the size of a .doc file created by it is only 2.78 KB but with other similar apps, that .doc file will become 6.30 to 14.50 KB in size. CON(S): It can't export a file into a .pdf file, I think. Also, it has a pretty bad design, particularly when creating/editing .ppt files; very 'user-unfriendly' if it's even word. Nevertheless, I can say that it's a pretty good app so thank you devs and I hope you'll still improve this app.

since my subscription expired and i updaated to a samsung s4 with dex i can no longer use word due to my screen being 1 inch over the allocated free version of the app. 5.99 for 1 inch over i dont think so! so this app is pointless to me for doing minimal paperwork for my boss at work. dissapointed to say the least you should at least be able to do basic word documents free!

A great tool for editing and reading documents on the go! Though I'd love a Read Aloud feature on mobile, though, so that i can listen to my document while I'm working. I don't have much time to read, and being able to listen would cut my editing and review time in half.

A real pain in the # and @$!! now that it requires a subscription, cloud services,  and c. I often spend more time with logging in to use it than I do using the danged program. I'm looking for a free online app to replace it. Updated, downgraded rating: Of course they had to change the way everything works so that I have to learn how to use it all over again!!!

Awesome. Although I have had several crashes happen, it has been rare. I absolutely love using this app. It comes in handy when I am "out and about" and need to write some notes down. It is especially handy at church and the Pastor says something you really want to remember and reflect on later.

Im updating my review due to my expirience with my Samsung Cromebook 3. This app is unuseable now unless you buy into it with Office 365. This is unacceptable, and I will uninstall the app immediatly and never use it again until a free version is rerealeased. Until then, Libra Office and Google Docs it is.

Word has always been a very powerful app in any version. It has never been user friendly. It is difficult to select text in the app and it tends to jump around a lot. Worse it eats a lot of memory.it may have 100 mb when you install it and 600 mb of data a week later. This doesn't include your files because they are not stored in the app. This is irritating because you regularly have to clear the data. What is all this data it's storing on my phone? Anyway what I like about word in any version is

Infuriating to use, but technically does what it's supposed to. Does everything it needs to and doesn't crash, but the curser jumps all over the place and it keeps zooming in and out and scrolling down three pages whenever you try to highlight something. No arrow keys to help you navigate.

I was primarily using it for numbered lists while beta reading a book, however it would frequently refuse to let me use multiple lists. I needed one list per chapter, yet it would continue the previous list despite a new chapter. Uninstalled for a different one, of which there are plenty.

I think the only "Android word processor" which lets u copy from a password protected doc file, of course u can do so on computer but not so easily on phone, "start where u left" is superb, zoom button is very helpful. The only problem is the size of the app.

So unreliable. If i could i would give you 0. Why?I was writing a document for 6hours straight, then I saved it and went away. when i retourned Word could not find it. It might have been removed,deleted or renamed. But how if it was on my phone all the time and i havent even opened a document at that time. And dont tell me that i might havent saved document. I would forget about something so important. Now on, I will use everything else instead of your app. I suggest using other app.

Let me put it this way...uninstall Googld Docs, or disable it if it is hard installed and you aren't familiar with removing apk's on your phone that were preinstalled. This is the real deal when it comes to office software. Unlike Docs, it can be backed up on to your SD allowing for more free space. On top of that: in conjunction with One Drive, this app is blatantly more efficient at collaborative work and doesn't have cumbersome lag in updating each person's side.

I would gladly give my opinion... AFTER I start using Word (or any other app/program). However, if I am asked immediately after enrolling/opening it, I feel a bit puzzled. I am very happy with the whole MS Office, but I have not yet tried it as an app on Android...

this is a software for work... why is it asking me the access to my media.. contacts... files etc... wen we want to download a file...? what has this software gotto do with my personal details? how is my contact details... media going to help in using this file...? ull are breaching our privacy trust and getting into our personal details... only permission may be it should ask is may for the storage details thats it... i will stop using this app otherwise... ull are cheating people

A perfect adjunct to real-world usage of the desktop version. Not all the features are there for a power user like myself, I've been teaching Excel for 20 years and using it in business much longer. Macros and VBA aren't there but through the use of OneDrive you can do that when at a proper PC version. For updating data and looking at the trends via charts etc. that are already in the spreadsheet, it is amazing!

Not perfect, but overall what works best on Android in my experience. Easy migration to other apps. Good for formulas and databases. Would have given 5 stars if it also had free charts and conditional formatting like Google Sheets. Its files get often corrupted, so do plenty of manual backups.

Not The Easiest app. UI when it comes to cell resizing is almost (if you don't throw your device with frustration) impossible. Test rotate alignment function non existant. Finally! Excel on my phone I have been using a different note app for my grocery list. Unfortunately, it won't total and I can't fill in quantities I need vs. what I have in my cart. I have worked with Excel heavily at my job, so this works really well for me!! The only issue I have is that some times too many popup menus get in the way of progress. I'm catching on to that, too.

I've used Excel for many years on desktop computers and found it very powerful. Using Excel on my smartphone is not as easy. This is also a newer version so there are some differences. Excel is always excellent. But using it in mobile phone is little different and difficult than using in PC (I heavily rely on excel in PC for my official works) and I always love excel. Am grateful for a free app to use on the go in my everyday life, no complaints thus far and access/interactive platform/server is smooth and seamless. Most importantly, I think they are doing a good job in keeping spams at bay, somthing not to be taken granted for!

as a qualified accountant working in industry and just old enough to remember working before spreadsheets I cannot imagine life without spreadsheets. Very basic. Not a patch on the real thing. Limited capabilities unless you go for the paid version, but both free and paid remain difficult to use. I have used Excel for more years than I wish to admit. I have used this  and  all the MicroSoft Office applications and love all of them. The more you use them, the more powerful you see that they are. If you want a simple spreadsheet, Excel works. If you want more complex spreadsheets with collaboration, pivot tables, VBA macros, and much more, Excel works. I will admit that the farther you go, the more developer tools you use, the more difficult it gets but the support groups are awesome!

Great for the mobile phone to be able to keep track and edit details of spreadsheets on the go without the need for laptop or tablet. Wasn't too keen on the functionality at first but quickly warmed to it. Doesn't replace the PC but becomes a welcome addition to the overall experience of the daily productivity.

Serious shortcoming when inputting data. The numeric keypad is brilliant, but returns to qwerty after each entry. How good it would be if it could remain as the numeric keypad until I chose to change it. Well done Microsoft. The new numeric keypad is even better than I had hoped. Super duper numeric keypad.

Awesome. Thanks for the Spreadsheet, which helps me calculate my employees Days and Hours they work. This tells them each, how much they are paid per hour, tells them the Total amount of Days they worked, the Total amount of hours per day. Finally it tells them individually, the Total amount of their paycheck, based on the calculated Information of their total Daily hours worked.

Apps as large as Excel (and the other Office apps) should allow me to store it on SD card. The fact that it doesn't--nor do the other, equally hefty Office apps on Android--suggests either arrogance or lackadaisy.

one of the most useful pieces of software ever written. Not easy to use so it's worth really delving into it's capabilities using a guide book or online tuition. The benefits of doing that will soon become clear. Superb - love using it.

This is probably my first review ever. All I can say is I have been using Excel on my phone for 3 months to date, I can't imagine managing my life and work without it. Goldsmith. Custom design studio.. I have been in business for over 35 years and used many merchant processing companies. All of them had a multitude of discount fees and monthly statement fees. Flint is a simple, straight forward flat rate. The entire Flint experience has been a fast, easy to use system. One feature I wanted with any company I do business with is to be able to talk to an actual person if a problem needed to be resolved. I've had very few reasons to contact support.

No attachment, no problem!. Even the EMV chip won't prevent a transaction from being charged successfully so I don't have to buy, carry, charge or lose an expensive reader to make a sale! I love that Flint takes care of invoicing, too and even reminds the customers who have forgotten to pay! I've deleted all other payment apps because I have found the superior one! The ONLY problem I am running into on my Android device is that Flint stops unexpectedly when edting the custom invoice appearance.

I am so so so sad that Flint has tanked. So highly reviewed and novel in its approach of using the camera on the phone and no external equipment. Loved this app, the rates and ease of use, but can no longer justify using it since they gave no warning to suspending card transactions with no indication of when (or if?) they would be up and running again. Ugh. I am now Square.

Garbage. Opened an account over a week ago and has never worked. Customer service phone number connects you to a robot that tells you to go to website and then hangs up on you. Website sends you in circles. No response from customer service emails for days. No clear way of cancelling account. I can't believe how much time this has wasted for me and my business and now having to contact clients to try and get checks from them instead.

So upset. Still waiting on them to deposit over $500 in payments to my account. Some orders are 3 weeks old. They emailed me and said it would be two days. Its been two weeks. Now they aren't responding at all. I still have to give my clients their merchandise because they were charged. I'm losing money. I feel scammed...I'm so upset!!

It used to be good........ It was great for awhile. I used it for my business. But now they're going through some changes and now it doesn't work. It keeps dating that my account had been suspended. Doesn't even give me a reason. Until they get things up and running I'm just going to rate them a 1 star.

Flint has gone down hill since merging with strip. No contact number to for issues. Been using Flint for three years and now it tells me I have no access associated with my email. GOING TO USE PAY PAL, they have the same fees and invoice options!

Well, I signed up a couple of years ago - loved the ability to speak to a human for support issues. Had no troubles with monies being deposited timely and the app worked great on my android, until . . . after a 9 month hiatus from sales due to family issues, I finally am back in the game and for my first sale my customer produced her credit card. No problem I assured her and proceeded with Flint to process the sale. Upon customer "signing" with her finger (and the screen stating her card had been accepted, when done) the next screen up says "Transaction Denied, contact customer support". Whaaaat? When I try to call, their phone number is "no longer in service". Whaaaat? So I log in to my account on my computer and see all the most recent reviews and must now suppose Flint is no longer in business. Now looking into Square.

Absolute garbage. Zero customer service. Literally zero. You can only email  and  their responses take a week. Soo... This app flagged as fraud on our customer's bank transactions, then this app froze our account  and  $5,000 worth of transactions for a month before they refunded ALL transactions back to ALL our customers. We had to track our customers down  and  process payments through a new system one at a time. Absolutely humiliating. We went through Wells Fargo  and  got a Clover Flex. Much happier now.

Loved but now no good. Used it for quite a while to receive payments every now and then with my business. Worked great (best out there actually) for almost any amount of payment. Then one day just a few weeks ago I tried to receive a $356 payment and it said there was now a 250 transaction limit. Tried to resolve and they closed my account. No phone support. Just a terse email saying that I wasn't worthy based on my credit score.

Too many problems. Tried to establish an account. System is "unable to verify my identity" and cannot validate my account information. Oh yeah, 2 connection errors when I tried to establish. Too many other options out there to have such a difficult time setting up an account.

DON'T USE! BEWARE!. Worst app. Poor customer service. Enter all my personal information. Go to charge a client and I'm told she cannot make payment. Ask customer service and they say I CAN'T use the service for my business. I'm a caterer. Now they have all my info, I cant use the service, and they wont tell me why. DON'T USE! SAFETY HAZARD!

Same problem as everyone else. It worked for a year + then stopped. Then an email comes saying they are combining with another company-Stripe-and charging even MORE money than Square is. Of course I've already switched by then because I run a business and deserve to get paid for it. Unlike these people.

Thieves. I used this app for a couple of weeks. Then they locked my account saying they needed more info on my business. I have it to them but still locked out. Worse, $250 dollars in transactions has disappeared. With neither I nor my client getting the money that was said to have been refunded. They also ignore phone call appointments. I made 2 different appts and they never called. I will be pursuing criminal charges against Flint.

TERRIBLE! If I could give it no stars I would. Beware that if a family member would like to purchase a service or good from your store it is not allowed. Fixed syncing issues with Outlook via Exchange as instructions on website did not work for me. My method: Make sure there are no other Exchange user accounts set up in the phone's Accounts section. Through Digical 'add calender' options  select Exchange (with the Gmail icon NOT MICROSOFT EXCHANGE ) enter Outlook address click manual set up select Exchange account then proceed. I'm using an Xperia so not sure if this is the reason. Otherwise a fantastic app uh all the features I need to stay organised via clear widgets. Weather function is a bonus.

However, the newest version has undone all of that. While I agree the GUI needed a refreshing, some of the changes make no sense as it took away features. The day view is just bad now; overlapping events are just odd and most of the text gets cut off. You also used to be able to double tap on a day when viewing in month mode and it would take you to the day in day view, but now it brings up a pop up window that is just a cluttered mess. I'm not even sure how many years I've used this app as my daily driver, but unfortunately with the redesign I will no longer be using it as it's just cumbersome now.

Microsoft!!! You have done it again! Another outstanding product offered. For those of you that have problems with Screen scaling on your devices, simply exit your session upon initial install. Click the step down horizontal bar icon on the upper center left hand side of your screen. Then click the x associated with your current session with that remote desktop. You will then be presented with a screen showing your available desktop sessions. Click on the session presented to start it up again, and Voila there is your entire desktop realestate. For those of you that figured this out after you commented, and did not update your input... Shame on you. People New to this rely on our exploration to enjoy the benefits. Again, thank you Microsoft for your dedication to innovation!!!

Not sure where in the tech trajectory the glitches originated (presenter mic, this app or my head phones) but I'm going with door #2. The visual was fine, with seamless YouTube integration. Presenter had couple slides, I think chose not to do visual/video stream. Leaves me with audio and chat. Chat was fine as well. (** Side note, skip to closing parentheses for rest of review ** I'm putting it out there officially here, we need to practice some common sense etiquette for webinar chat. My vote: Same rule as texting. I always say I don't text (try not to) anything I wouldn't say to your face. Don't type anything into a chat box in a webinar attended by 20 or more ppl that you wouldn't raise your hand and say at a live presentation or event. I include myself here, I think it's very tempting to type and get attention, forgetting there are 59 other invisible but real people who politely don't want to hear/read every thought that crosses your mind. Add to that the ability to chat with other attendees, and it's way too noisy and distracting. Just picture a live event, and use restraint, which most folks do, but I'm asking people to be aware and intentional about this. And presenters should lead the way and be clear how they want the chat feature used as well. Keeping in mind, I am there to learn, and so far my brain hasn't evolved to where I can learn effectively and process info that way, with both input and output fully active. Maybe just me, or maybe I'm wrong. Just my two cents, end of side note.) Anyway, this app missed the mark in the only area that mattered which was audio. Again not sure what issue was but audio cut in and out several different times, had to fiddle around trying to figure a fix and turned out (and here chat WAS handy) i could fix by logging in and out. Did that at least 4 times, missed maybe 60% of talk. And that's ridiculous. Back to work devs.

This app is just terrible. I've been actively lobbying my company to use literally anything else as Join.me is so frustrating and limited in use. Why are the video chat bubbles either tiny postage stamps or zoomed so far in a narrow angle that they're useless for seeing more than a single person? Why do I connect to a meeting, then also have to initiate a connection to the voice service? That's just poor functional design. Connecting me to a meeting should automatically connect me to the voice call. Finally, why the heck does audio chat not work over mobile data? THE WHOLE POINT OF A MOBILE APP IS USING IT ON THE GO. Why should I have to be tethered to wifi when high speed LTE data is ubiquitous? I don't know of a single other collaboration platform that was designed so poorly and idiotically.

Makes good scans. Multi-page and single-page. Automatically removes shadows, increases contrast, and identifies edges of pages. Facilitates post-scan improvement of images. Could flatten better, but pretty good as is. Does all that without the flash on your phone. Would be nice to have manual light (flash) control. Surely available, I just haven't tried that hard to find it. Soooo, without putting in any effort, nor learning anything new, Genius Scan does what it should. That's a perfect app.

Better than Office Lens and I don't even have the 'pro' version. No ridiculous ads to deal with; intelligently designed, user-friendly UI -- Genius Scan is efficient and effective in every way it should be. I've been using this app since I got my iPhone 4 almost 8 years ago. I've re-downloaded it through each iteration of phone I've owned and I've always considered it to be one of my most essential productivity tools. Can't recommend this app highly enough.

Excellent app, best out there. The cropping and enhancement options are very well done. However, upon converting the images to pdf the resulting pdf was missing a number of pages and had numerous duplicates of other pages. I ended up saving each individual image to my phone, uploading them to my computer and then using an online program to make the pdf. This app has potential but I was disappointed.

I used to use another app called Tiny Scanner, but they now require a paid version to batch scan. I'm glad I switched to Genius Scan, as it's the most convenient multi-page scanner I have used. The immediate page crop and adjustments are great. It also has a fair distribution of paid and free features.

I tried several scanner apps today and wasted hours with them. Genius scan was the only one I found that did batch document scanning docs and didn't have their "detection" algorithm get in the way of just taking a series of simple pictures and stitching them together

Very good PDF app to use, but wish that it would have a little message that says message(s) sent. Because after I press send to send my messages/PDF's it goes back to I guess the original screen and I can't really tell whether my messages were sent or not. I have to go all the way to my email and look under my sent messages to see if it's been sent.

This is so easy to use, I love it. Taking pictures for scans has never been easier, you just need to align the document and the scan happens it self. Taking multiple scans as a batch is also super easy. It's the easiest app I have seen for pdf scans

Was using another app and frustrated, colleague recommended Genius Scan. I love it. It is simple, clean, easy to organize and share. I use it even for situations where I would have used my printer/scanner before

Good for scans of documents. A little laggy and sometimes the auto-crop doesn't register, but the manual cropping works fine. If you don't have a dedicated scanner, this app works pretty well as a substitute.

Great app. Super useful and efficient, would be nice if more features and export methods were offered with the free version. Also paid version is a bit too expensive. Other than its great. Minimal ads aswell.

This app makes it really easy to get digital copies of paper. I work at a school and if a parent emails me saying their child forgot their homework, I can just take a photo of the assignment and email it to them.
Simple to use and unlike Microsoft Office Lens no product lock-in. You can save scans to several cloud storage services. Dropped to 4 stars because it keeps dropping out of magic mode.

Great "scans" each time I use it. It is the auto upload to the cloud feature that makes this app wonderful since my files are accessible anywhere I go. Honestly, super handy! The only thing I don't understand is the smart labels. Either I'm not smart enough to understand smart labels or the labels aren't smart. Still trying to figure them out.

I have tried other scanning apps and nothing compared to Genius Scan. I like that I dont have to press a button and the app scans the paper for me! I have had tremendous luck with scanning all of my tax documents.
Great for scanning books to pdf. A bit slow, but it gets the job done. I had lots of problems with iScanner app that I don't have with this one.
This app had bug and all my important docs are lost now. I don't have any other copy of them. I hate this app
so handy to have. only wish they had folders i could creat ti lump documents together when i get so many.
Worked really well. Fast and easy to use. There's a cropping feature so don't worry if you get some background on the pic cause you can get rid of it later.
I really have needed this app so many times, its ridiculous! Every time it's been a life saver!
Simply the best camera to document app! You can take a sloppy picture and completely customize how you crop the document so you don't have background in the image. Great features and good UI.
I am in Belize and not easy to find a photocopier. Someone told me to try it and love it and I will purchase the full program. "thumbs up" best app so easy to use !
As a teacher this saves me a complicated trip to the copy room. I can easily electronically save docents and send them to my email right from my desk.

I absolutely love this app. Scan great. Single or multiple docs. Converts to pdf. Easy to share via email. I use this app for work and personal use. Everyone needs to have this app on their phone. You never know when your gonna need it. Works great!
Very clear images. I can take photos of music and i don't have to make the pictures brighter before i print. It's great!
you have to pay to do basic things. i miss Evernote's Scannable app for iPhone

The paid version is worth every cent. Recently upgraded to Genius Cloud to sync and its a little slow but a great way to back up files. Well done.

Great app, forget about relying on a copy shop for scanning documents. You can scan single or multiple sheets per file and then send it to your email or wherever you want. I recommend always using a flat surface like a desk to improve the scanning quality.
I love this app! Easy scanning, easy upload to the cloud or your drive. I use this to scan hundreds of documents a week as a part of my business travel.
I use this all the time to scan documents for my business. Since I only scan things periodically, and usually just a few pages at a time, I find this easier than a real scanner.
Consistently reliable. Hate that I have to pay in order to save and transfer docs to new phone
This app makes it super simple to take pictures of documents and turn them into PDFs. I've also used it to make jpeg's of old printed photos. Love it!

this app is very easy to us. there could be more faq answers but problems can be worked through.
Overall I'm a big fan. I just think the cropping could be a bit more customizable. I often get results that make a page look wavy. That's a small quirk about this app, but overall it's a great tool!

love this app and how it allows me to turn documents into pictures into PDF instantly when I may not be anywhere my computer. love it

I am an aircraft maintenance technician and I love this app! I am able to remotely scan aircraft logbooks/tech documents and email them to whomever I need to within the industry. The document search feature is a lifesaver when looking for a specific aircraft or logpage number! I also love how documents are not stored in my phone's gallery cluttering up my pictures. appName: TurboScan: scan documents and receipts in PDF

Excellent multi-page functionality. Love it! I highly recommend it to everyone who needs to scan documents on the go!

This is a real pain-saver for documentation tasks. Creates good scans and also has a lot of options for sharing and storing (locally and in the cloud). The OCR seems have improved, it's now quite fast, and I have no crashes like earlier. It embeds the recognised text into the generated PDF's, making them searchable. It could still improve: - Enhance the filters with an "anti-vignettte" functionality - Make the preview of the "autocapture" rectangle a litte more precise (this sometimes shows a rectangle way off the paper, but the scan then is only the paper) - Make OCR more precise. Some words, especially with german umlauts do not get properly recognised. I use an english language setting, thus it may not expect these characters. - Use some "fast and loose" OCR to auto detect titles only any use these for naming the PDF's. This alone would be worth the bucks for OCR.

When it works, it's excellent and no similar app is better. But it's so buggy. I'm frequently contacting support to fix various issues. Yes they eventually get fixed but it's pretty annoying to have so many. Had to drop from 5 to 3 stars until i can go a while without a bug report.

AMAZING! Finally an app that "really" does do higher resolution scans! (Camscanner unfortunately decreases resolution even from imported files) The auto shoot and crop is WONDERFUL. Only sorting and saving is a bit to get used to (I don't find it intuitive enough). I miss an option to make an album (or chosse batch), and then scan into the album, autoname files by the album and then upload the full album online (instead of having to choose indiviual files manually from the main list). The overview with all scans being thrown into one main list isn't functionally satisfying. Also too much back and forth to rename scans that belong to a named group - you have to remember to reset to a new default name each time, manually mark files and then upload. This is all handier with Camscanner (batch mode which saves all scans into a indivitual sets and let's you "select all" ) or Photomyne (albums). It would be nice to have a choice to do batch and then be asked what the default name of the files should be. But maybe this is already possible Scanbot and I missed it? Otherwise 10 stars! - November 3 update: I jist found out that group naming is a snap! Just choose multipage scanning. You will see the default naming scheme on the top of the screen. If you edit that filename it will be used as the default on saving and any additional scans in that set will be named in incremental steps with (1), (2), (3) etc. :D - Ich habe nicht mal gemerkt das ihr eine Deutsche Firma seid. Top Produkt, danke :D

This company has some problems. The app originally was pretty good and I could see it becoming great in the CRM field, but they took some wrong turns. First, how does a CRM app not allow the use of the word appointment anywhere? An appointment is the basic unit of sales. All of the previous CRM's I used allowed you to easily schedule an appointment and call it an appointment. It causes a lot of confusion, an event could be a lot of things. Next, they had custom fields you could make and use, but in an update they did away with them and you lost all data you entered into them. And speaking of losing data, as far as I can tell there is no way you can back up your data and keep it safe yourself. Now they have updated the software and it is incompatible with my device. How nice. Once again they have took away features, in this case the ability to use it. They have some things working for them, but it looks like some competitor has infiltrated their business and is sinking them (no I am not serious, but they couldn't do much better if they were) This company desperately needs to communicate with some traditional salespeople and listen...

The Android version of this app keeps time for a project task down to the thousandth decimal place. The iPhone and web app do not do this and round to the nearest minute. This causes me to get times such as 3.2578 hours instead of simply 3.26. I bill by rounding to the nearest quarter hour so this really causes issues. When my times are imported from my app to the freshbooks website, I have to go to every single task and round them myself. There is no way to change the seconds on the Android app and the iPhone app doesn't even keep track of seconds. The iPhone app is the way it should be. I have asked for a feature request to be put in several times to fix this issue with no luck. Freshbooks needs to get its act together and fix this stupid bug!

Freshbooks is great in theory but a lack of some very basic features make this product a hassle to use. In the web app, if you create an invoice or estimate and forget to manually save, after a period of time you will be prompted to login again and you will loose whatever work you just did. There is no auto save! If you sit down so work on something after not having been at your computer for a while, you can do so but when you go to save something, switch from invoices to estimates, you will be prompted to login again and loose everything you were just working on. Between no auto save and constantly being prompted to login in again, I have lost a tonne of work and had to recreate the work each time. For this reason alone and after being stupid enough to continue to use Freshbooks for 3.5 years I have decided to switch to a more reliable product that doesn't double my workload. This is just one example of poor quality product, I could go on, the mobile app is worthless, I've had problems with it since I first tried it, eventually I just gave up on it. But after you renamed it, this has been driving me crazy, it's now called "Keep notes" on the home screen, as in the second word is lower case..literally every other single app is capitalized every word, and so it needs to read "Keep Notes" please, I know it's a bit of a pet peeve to mention, but it's driving me insane!!!! Yay! The latest update fixed the punctuation!! Thanks!

Please add feature to lock keep widget in my home screen. I have Google keep widget in my home screen. Due to accidentally touches its adding random characters and messing up my notes. Add feature to add fingerprint authentication to open the notes. People adding sensitive information to keep and lock will help protect it
Been using this for years now and it's ever let me down. I only have one feature request and that would be to enable sub checkbox (the indented checkboxes) collapsing and expanding.
The app is great but the UI is horrible: all white and childish. At least add a black/dark theme. Also please implement multilevel checklists.

Fantastic app! I can keep track if everything here! I can jot stuff or record it before it fly's right out of my head!! I can send grocery lists and to do lists to family and set reminders on my calendar!

Can't it be a full fledged notes app for Android or Pixel lovers? One end Google want its cloud to be successful with out offering right products even from their eco system. It can't support rich text, you can't copy paste a web page as is, no styling, it can't even support if one want to move all apple notes or evernotes as is into this app. This is what any iOS user feels when he tries to switch! Fill the gaps and follow the lead before experimenting new features!
When I press on the reminder banner it does nothing, doesn't open the note so I need to go to the app to edit it or cross out the items. Please fix

It's a disorganization tool. Should be renamed 'Lose.' Keeping notes in this fashion is counterproductive organizational practice. 1/3 of the screen is taken up for a single ToDo item? From the screenshots it looks like the developers don't even understand what belongs on their calendar, and what belongs in a ToDo list.

Why basic practical features get removed with updates? If want to add reminder to a note, the button is given way on right top instead of bottom. So have to use second hand to reach it. Also, remind after hour is removed.
Great app. Easy to use and fast. Wish it had OCR for better keywords for search. Perhaps a scratch feature would be great too. A Evernote import would also great so I also stop using it
For a month now the app is not stable. Notes get double notifications, when postponing a note from the notifications a different note is being updated, and other flakey behaviors.
Please bring back ability to zoom out of drawings. with this update user is unable to zoom out to see whole page or shrink view. this is highly valuable for sketching perspective.
I use Keep all the time. The more I use it the more I need more color options for organizing. Is that possible? Otherwise I would give it a 5.will re rate if that can occur

Cool update, but just some suggestions. Where the labels are, id like to see my number of notes. I keep a lot of notes because I write poetry so each label I'll know how many love poems, family poems I wrote. (U get the idea) also, it would be great to color the labels. I think we should be able to lock certain notes.

Hi, Google team, wish you well, during my daily action of noting and writing, I figured out some of my writings (sentences I wrote in a note) is going to disappear, as long as I close my note or the app and this manner is repetitive and sort of annoying, I wish you could help me with some tips on how to save notes and to protect writings so that they could not disappear. And I'm not sure whether this writings are permanent or not so I always have them, and what is the perpose of archiving?

I find this app very useful in jotting down everyday task to look over. so far so good and look forward to continuing to use this. also its a big plus that if deleted you want lose your stuff.very nice app well thought out!
The app has been great up until the update. Now It is lagging and constantly stopping.

Its is very good but needs some extra improvements: 1- user can't add picture except in top of note. Can't move picture. 2- Text abilities like: Bold, Italic and Highlight don't exist. 3- Checkboxes appear in all lines. Can't add single checkbox for single line. 4- Needs password protection.

I like Keep very much, it's easy to take important notes that you might forget or even set reminders that are automatically adsed to Google Calendar if you're using it. But there is still left room for new features.
Works great on Samsung Galaxy Note and Google Pixel C. App is used daily to manage my life.
Wish it was a bit more like Blackberry Memo though: auto arranging each note by title, etc. It's very good nonetheless. 2018 Edit This is the only Note / Memo that I use now. It does all I need.
Best app for making notes, shopping lists, reminders etc. I use it daily.
working better than ever before. bugs ironed out. I can now recommend this app to you.
Very beautiful app! Needs iprovements in the typing section, there have to be more ways to write the text like bold...italic...?! Also, people need to number lists! That has to be a option!
after update..."Keep" reminder failed, didnt trigger ...

Gute App - bis Update. Seit dem Update ist alles schlimmer geworden. Farben, animationen, etc. Bitte bis zum nchaten Update wieder beheben, dann auch wieder 5 sterne

Unable to sort a list alphabetically. Pretty poor for a 'list' app.

My favorite app right now!
We should be abble to sort the order of a list alphabetically. This would make easier to find duplicated itens.
Very practical now . Future updates guarantees to make it useless.
If you need simple text note, this suit you. fast searching, reminder, check list, save url. and sync across platform for offline experience.
So simple it is the best app for all platforms only complaint is there is no stand alone app windows 10
security options are missing... like pin or password
its okay but i think u guys need to add hide note setting for me to be able hide my love letters
Still no way to sort lists.
need password protection for app notes

I cannot transfer notes from one phone to the next after backing up the files on SD card. It crashes every single time even after reinstalling. I have very important info in those notes.The app is flawless other than this issue. Please help me fix it and I will give 5 stars.

Had to restore factory settings. Saved to my sd card. I did i couple of times to make sure. After resetting the files are gone. I also used the backup button. Checked my sd card and cannot find where the files were stored. Anyone out there know if i can somehow retrieve notes? Pretty bummed lots of notes lost.

If the screen saver on my phone kicked in, all my entries were lost. To save so it doesn't lose any data, you have to back right out of the app. Say "Yes I was to quit this app" Then open it and carry on. Going to move all my data into something else and flush this app.

Worst App Ever Used. It doesn't have the ability to restore . It crashes when selected to Import. Pls don't use it.. My sincere advice. Try a better one.. "" Idiot Developers "'. Lost every thing. Its really painful to lose important notes. Just waste of time. Never ever use this. If u use this, I can even bet u, you will be one more person to write the same sort of review on this Nonsense App.

You can't transfer notes from phone to PC. Defeats the whole purpose. Nobody wants to have a idiotic notepad app that only creates notepads to be used over the phone when I can easily have another app that does both. Hated it. Very disappointed that I ever downloaded this stupid good for nothing app.

This app is beyond filled with ads. If you want a way to write ideas or keep a grocery list on your phone for the love of god do not get this. It WILL crash and delete. It WILL take you to a random site due to the ads that constantly pop up. Do not put a full page of something because you won't be able to scroll all the way down unless you're editing it. Overall, bad app.

Was really nice until a week ago, ads like crazy!!!. Used this app for years and loved it! Until a few months ago (I use this app for my grocery list) I would look at a note, (my grocery list), clear something out, turn my screen off, and repeat, my list would "refresh" to what it said hours ago or weeks ago and my current list is completely gone. As of November, ads open EVERYTIME I open the app, a 5 sec add turns on... Deleting now!!

THE WORST APP EVER!!!!!!!!!!. If you save passwords or any important info on this app  and  dont access it often or for a while it locks you out of those notes/files. I reported it constantly  and  daily  and  still no fix. I want my info I saved  and  need !!!!! I am switching to a new app, I'm so done with this one! I rated a negative zero to infinity  and  beyond it is that bad!
Unusable! Crashes after inputting list but before saving. Reinstalled but didn't solve the problem. If you cannot save your lists, what's the point of this app.

Fast, lightweight app. Not quite as easy to use as ColorNote. Since it doesn't solve the problem I am having with ColorNote (backups are in a database rather than txt files) I will keep looking for alternatives.
Basic functions don't work reliably. Accessing some IMPORTANT notes now causes the app to freeze and close. If your app cannot perform it's basic core functions, then why are you even here...
My list disappears every time I get out of the site. Tell me how to fix it and if it works I'll change to 5 stars. It's a good app of you can get the notes you take to stay.

This used to be a great app. I've had it for a while. There are far too many ads. When the ads pop up when one is trying to write a note it causes the user to inadvertently click on the ad and sending him or her to a website, the app store, or both.
Pretty good for notetaking but ads have become increasingly intrusive. Not portable unless u have an SD card. Good for storing info for a limited time. Better than paper/pencil but not by much.

I don't appreciate flashing advertising banner telling me I have three viruses on my phone. I realize that nothing is free but I don't take kindly to scammy deceptive advertising and can't trust anyone that would allow that kind of lowlife marketing on their app. There are other note pad options. Uninstalling.
Way too many ads!. I love the app but I'd rather pay a fee to have no ads. Since your last update every time you open the app or try to add a note an ad overtakes your whole screen.

This is a very useful app for me. It also work well but just one problem I have with this app. There is no undo option. It the this option could be added to this it will be the perfect app. Hope the team will revert me in this regards.

I've used this one app for 3 years, but recent updates have made it no longer fit for purpose Not only does it crash more often but they've added occasional 5second video adverts that override your media volume settings and silent mode. I'm uninstalling. I can't have a basic notes tool making all that stupid noise sporadically when I'm using it at the hospital or just want it to open immediately to take something down. Either be functional basic notepad with advertising across parts of the display, or offer a no ad upgrade, but this is no longer fit for purpose

Used it for a while, naive to the other notepad apps out there. Too many annoying ads. I gave them a pass for the banner ads at the bottom of the screen, but a simple notepad has no reason to have a full screen ad that you have to click the tiny X in the corner to get out of it. In addition, I'm fairly certain the stars it's getting is inflated with potentially fake reviews. A large number of Indian people have all given the app 5 stars, with only a few actually saying something, and even then it's just stuff like "awesome!" and "it's cool. You must get!"
It takes forever to type out notes  and  make lists only to disappear. And checked items uncheck themselves. Don't waste your time downloading this app.
Could not save entry. Could not navigate the sight. This a new phone and was supposed to work like my old phone. It doesn't. Will try to find my previous notebook app. Sorry
Main complaint is backup to SD card failed to restore on new phone. And scrolling while selecting text got buggy. Lost some info.
Certain shopping lists or page notes simply disappear suddenly and is all blank and gone for ever. I lost important data on this app. It's very unpleasant.

That's a good app, but you need to correct some problems: First every time i enter a note it automatically become the first in the list. Second and the most important is that i creat a folder and add notes to it but the nots wont appear on the folder this is very important to me to orgenize notes because i have alot of them. And lastly the app doesn't ask you if you are sure when edeting a note .. That caused a lot of problems .. As i edit a note some times by mistake and it saves it. Please fix it and make an update. I will be very grateful.

I've been using this app for years. Now I have to watch a video commercial to use it. It does let me skip the ad after 5 sec., but that's still much too intrusive. I'm uninstalling it and finding another. Finally got rid of it. Apparently, the devs don't read their reviews. Now using Google Keep.
Offer a paid version please.... I've used this app for years but all the ads since the last update cause it to constantly crash and I'm losing notes and lists before I can even backup! :-(
It's ok. Doesn't hold a password very well. I set the p/w then go back in later and it's unprotected. And so many ads pop up as you're trying to type or read the note.
Had an important assignment written and saved and now I cannot find it. Don't have another copy. Have lost my document. Did not delete it, cannot recover it. This ruined my experience.

The app has a layout that seems like it was done minutes ago, the amount of ads really frustrate you as most of them are videos and you have to wait till the end to close them. Once you open a shopping list more than 5 times all the items are removed, it constantly deletes notes and has a problem with saving notes, it can't be used in split screen and has no sense of order. The backup options don't work, you can put your notes and pictures in a folder but there's no guarantee that you'll get to see them again and you can't view your folders so that's another useless feature.
I don't know about all those things. All I know is that it works great for me! I lost it for a while and panic. I thought I paid for this at one point but if not where do I send the check?
Technical prob i am not able to open this app on my phone after update of this app. I have so much important notes on it.
The problem i would highlight is if i try to scroll my notes down and accidently app detects text selection... as soon as i press any key entire text is lost forever. no undo button

I would give this app 5 stars if an ad didn't pop up whenever I try to create a note. Also, why does it need access to my photo, media, files, camera and microphone.? That seems a little suspicious. Does Google own the source code?
Wrote a very long note in text format, the app autosaved my text to voice.. When I tried to open it, the app keeps crashing. Now if I don't get Help I'm about to lose a massive write-up
I've been using this app for a long time and loved it, but now there are Ads EVERYTIME you open it that take you to other websites WHILE you're trying to use it. Time to find a new app.

I would give it 5 stars if it would contained notes having dates like diary and when we wish to share any content from google to mobile there not shews notepad .Folder function too is not working well.Plz resolve

This app constantly deletes the contents of new notes, especially shopping lists. I have spent far too many times entering in my list of ingredients for a recipe, just to save the note and open it back up to see a completely blank page. It even happens to old notes less frequently and is absolutely useless for its purpose. Even if you write an entire list of entries and then rotate your phone orientation a single time before saving, the whole screen will wipe the note clean. Not to mention how finicky the save feature is to begin with where you are required to back out of the note in order to save it but cannot close the app or else it is deleted. This goes for checkmarks too, if you check things off and then just exit out of the app, you better remember what you checked off because this app sure wont. Would not recommend if you value your sanity, I am going to uninstall and just stick to paper notes until I am done writing my shopping list app

As soon as I opened this it popped up a link that my brand new phone memory is full...after a restart it said my phone was infected....could not continue with notebook notebook til install app...go suck

I have been using this app for so long, but recently it is not getting opened on my phone( it is at its latest version)... Now how do i see my notes??? I m stuck n tired trying to open it since a week. Plz help me retrieve my saved notes.

Amazon ad pops up every now and then. It's too annoying when you are noting down something seriously and Amazon pops up with a bunch of its products and ask you to install. Rather I uninstalled this app itself
Recently, the reminder times keep disappearing and I'd have to keep resetting. As a result of that, I've missed carrying out tasks on time. Not reliable anymore. Please fix.

I have used Wunderlist for several years for making a variety of types of lists. I primarily use it for multiple shopping lists (groceries, specific stores or types of items, home business supplies, internet shopping. etc.). I have used Wunderlist in the past for project and task lists and continue to do this for simple to do lists. I have found that using the Pomodoro technique with a task timer helps me with productivity so I am using another app for work projects and tasks.
This is a brilliant app that does more than I expected. Very useful tool that works in sync across computer and laptop. Highly recommended!
This app does everything I need but there are issues with adding to do on the windows version.
i love this app. has helped me get organized and downsize my stuff. helped to carve up large projects into smaller more manageable pieces.
makes planning  and  grocery shopping communication with my husband a breeze
great way to keep track of things you need or need to do.
So far so good
simple, feature rich. i can set daily checklist reminders
guys after the update the widget does not work properly
Alarm option is missing. Everything else is good.
Perfect if integrate with calendar
Loving it so far

One of my favorite applications. Love the fact that you can close this app for private use. The only DOWNSIDE is that, you have to be careful when you open some of your saved info that you don't tap the small box to the LEFT because it automatically errases it. Maybe this needs to be changed. I have a copy an important list of my meds on Note app because it's happened to me 3 times and you cannot restore it apparently within 30 days...this doesn't work either! Needs urgent change!

I have been using wunderlist for over two years now. The best list I have created is the WEEKEND PLAN lists for FRIDAY SATURDAY AND SUNDAY. I SHARE these lists with my wife and it really helps with planning the weekend. Plus the items you did not complete SATURDAY can be easily moved to SUNDAY. All in all really good app, just don't go list crazy, keep it simple.

love how handy the app is, however I need reminder notifications specialized so I can assign a choice of sound so when i hear that sound I will know to check wunderlist for my next task. it will only show on notifications pull down menu which uses my system notification sound. which goes off all thruout the day. Need to differentiate wirh a particular sound

I switched to wunderlist bc astrid was shutting down. I tried all the recommended replacements and found wunderlist to be the best. Transfer of tasks was easy and everything was kept on their separate lists - very important as it meant I didn't have to manually reassign over 100 things (unlike any.do which lumped everything together). Other issues is that some tasks were duplicated, but that's a comparatively minor niggle. The app itself is easy to use and has the features I used in Astrid.

App is just what i was looking for. I didn't upgrade, the free app works great. It syncs across my 2 tablets and phone, no matter on which device I enter the info. Use this app for book lists to read, questions at appointments and shopping lists. One of most useful apps I have found!

Switched from splendo because it kept dropping my entries randomly from my list and also because of the obnoxious ads in splendo. This is a really good app for managing my schedule. The only change I would wish on it is I would like to set it to automatically sort according to due date instead of manually having to resort it after each entry. Also wouldn't mind having an option to set appt times along with the date. Other than that I am pleased with this app

I use this app, a lot. I favor that the interface keeps a person focussed on the task at hand. As opposed, to say dressing things up with formatting and attachments. Wunderlist accomplishes this by dint of a fairly simple interface, one that disallows "pretti-fication" of your notes. Features: Sub-tasks (with check-boxes)!! Yay! * multiple reminders * recurring items, like annual.dates * good export features Overall: *5*

This is a good app for organizing this and to-do lists. My biggest complaint is that once something is created, you can't move it to another list. That would be a nice feature for an update. Currently, you'd need to re-create the note from scratch if you want it under a different list. Otherwise, I recommend it.

want to solve marital nagging about chores? here is the solution. amazing! you can assign tasks, share lists, have private lists and sync it with the desktop app version. notification options are great. I get so happy seeing something was completed. even works for monthly revolving chores. love love love

Mobile and desktop sync well together. Love the sub-folders feature, which helps me stay organized... One frustration: searching within the app for items that have been marked as completed. This works well in desktop and iOS but NOT in Android. Would be great if they fixed this.

To summarize it in a single sentence...This is the best app in its category. I've been old school, maintaining diaries for a long time because I didn't find anything good like this one. This is so useful to me that it made me write an app review for the first time. Wunderlist changed it ALL!

Update: I have gone back to school to get my BSN RN degree  and  Wunderlist has saved my butt so many times! Please retire To-Do Microsoft  and  leave Wunderlist be! The program is quite simple to use. Very easy navigation. Love that you can break down a task into sub tasks, add notes, files, etc. Easy to share a list with family members or co workers so everyone can be on the same page! Please don't take it away, Microsoft!

One serious omission makes app next to useless. You need to be able to sort completed to-dos. I have grocery list of about 100 completed items. I click on the ones I need to put them back on my list. Problem is that the 100 items are not in order. PLEASE fix this!

such a great app! reuse lists over again by showing completed items and unchecking them to repopulate. very handy for packing lists etc. share lists with your spouse to both have access to add and remove items, add links and pics to stuff in sub menu if each item eg. recipes in a cooking menu list

Great app. so easy and functional! Fits all needs and is very pleasant to use! Developers: would love to add my own background inside the app, and be able to pick the colour  and  transparency of the widget myself. ESPECIALLY the colour of the items I star needs options, because red doesn't work with the other colours on my phone's desktop at all.

Best app ever. Amazing for grocery lists. I normally call out all of the bugs and everything wrong with an app but this one just gets everything right. There's even a desktop app and a web site. My girlfriend and I use it to track a shared grocery list and a todo list. The only problem is keeping ourselves disciplined enough to use it. The permissions system was a little tricky to figure out at first but once you have it setup it just works. Been using this app for years now and I it!

My husband and I share the groceries list, so whoever pops into the shop can get what we need. And it is so satisfying to tick things off the list and get that little "ding" sound. We love wunderlist. I have recommended it to friends, who also love it.

1) how do we delete a sub-task when we found out it's not belong to a task after adding it? 2) should allow sub-task to duplicate for other tasks too 3) should allow sub-task to shift under other tasks too 4) should allow reminder for individual sub-task and able to sort according to reminder date and time 5) the overdue alert still there even I have deleted the tasks!! I have to duplicate and delete the original to stop it. Pls fix this.

My family loves it. Between hair cuts, school functions, business meetings, doctors appointments, groceries and gifts for Christmas, birthdays or any occasion, this app is a must have for families on the go or on a tight schedule. At least it keeps us on the same page. If it wasn't in the app, then it didn't happen...lol

The app keeps asking to login each time you open... This was a great app once ago... today this bug is totally annoying... ask for credentials everytime in a web app is ok, but in the app... doesn't make sense for me... looking for another and less buggy todo list app

I can easily create to do lists and tasks then have a sub To do list. I like that I can separate the events or separate tasks so everything stays personal and a person from one event doesn't see tasks from another. And sharing is a bit tricky at first but once you figure it out it's great. Love this app and have been telling everyone about it.
