comment: great app, but, if you need a second line in the checklist you should be making a note instead. it's a little frustrating that the enter key doesn't go to next item instead especially since I have to back out of my keyboard on the phone if the list has more than 5 items. is that a possible change?

appName: Keep My Notes - Notepad and Memo
comment: Dropping 3 stars for the addition of ads, and the only premium is a subscription. Really? A subscription for a note keeping app? I'd be ok with a one time purchase, but even at 1 dollar a year, a subscription is just asinine for this type of app. Uninstalled.
its a very good app i like to use it to write my music on.(because my hand writing is really bad) I recomend using jt its preyty good in my opinion

Been using this amazing App for over 5yrs still happy with it.. it is still user friendly, still relevant  and  flexible, with multiple uses for everyday living. Shopping lists, To Do Lists are easy to set up  and  add to screen. Tick off items as you shop and untick as and when u need items again, easy to add new items. Can sort lists according to status ie, ticked items go to bottom of list. Widgets that come with the App r great for setting reminders, sticky notes on screens, calendar is great addition to home screen for speedy use.

This is my most used app on my phone. It can be used for just about anything. It has a checklist feature or just regular text  and  you can lock and even color code specific notes if you wanted to. I absolutely LOVE this app! I don't know what I would do without it. Thanks ColorNote for keeping me so organized and making things so easy  and  simple for me! It helps me keep track of things, medication  and  other health info for my doctor, grocery lists, random thoughts, journaling,  and  so much more!

Love this app (: Edit - I very rarely rate apps, but today I was using Color Note, and on the way out, it asked if I would like to rate the app. I truly love Color Note so much, it has helped me stay organized and maintain a ton of important notes and lists for years. I decided to come here and rate the app, got here and discovered that I already had done so before! Lol, clearly it's a winner in my book

Super straightforward to use and incredibly useful. I love making my checklists with it and adding the important lists to my home screen as a widget so I do not forget about them. Only thing so far that I wish it could do and doesn't is if I copy-paste a list into it, it could become a checklist rather than a note (for example when I copy a list of ingredients for a recipe and paste it into the app). Still so glad this app exists - thank you!

Review from 27March 2014: I've had this app (on various phones) since 2011, it's never failed me once! It's simple and functional. It's cool to see all my old notes from when I first started writing. That's possible with the sync feature. Overall, marvelous app! Update: 5 years later, and this app still performs as expected. I can't believe I've been using this since 2011. It's even more surprising that it's kept its integrity with zero ads. I have yet to be let down. Sync feature is amazing

This app just works. Been usint it for years! Excellent to keep shopping list, to do lists or any important notes to remember. Create a check list or copy text. Change colour of your notes. Sinc it with other devices. Or share the notes with others when needed. Very handy to send my husband our shopping list if he's at the shops. And I'm so glad it stored l my notes safely, when I lost my phone... I didn't lose my notes. Thank you

I've barely used the features in this app over a few months and its defiantly a keeper. I really like it. I've changed some colors here and there and written a lot of quick notes and long notes. It will do a lot more but I haven't had time to check out the rest. Two of the features are enough to sell me on it. One being you can drop it like a rock and it saves automatically. Meaning I have hit the back button. I have closed it. Turned the phone off on it and it still saves what you were writing. I also like the backup feature. Both of these features have been flawless for me. It does even more. I view it as just a rough and tumble app that is by your side. Ready when you are. Thanks Dev's.

Great notepad, been using it for years now, though i got a suggestion that's been on my mind for awhile and may seem petty but how come material color on this app does not match status bar ? evey other app i got since lollipop does that. Not a deal breaker but makes experience on the app look so much better.

Great note taking app! It's super nice and simple. One flaw though. What if I loose my phone with all these notes. If someone has that phone they can see all notes I write down at all times. There should be a way to log out of all devices. Like facebook. I would love this app If it was more secure. Just an idea. (Samsung Galaxy S5)

I've been using Color note for about three years now. It is simple to use, a basic notes and calendar application, which allows me to keep miscellaneous notes, share a shopping list with my wife and keep track of when and who my customers are as well as what I have done for them. I am sure that you can find even more uses for it. It has online storage and synchronization which makes it device independent. Give it a try. It's not only free but ad free. Thank you very much developers.

I dont like rating things but I have used this app constantly for taking notes on my phone. There might be something better but this is what I use and I love it! Edit 2017: I still absolutely love this app. I have notes dating back years with this thing and notes that haven't been lost because this program syncs across all devices. It's not perfect, I think I've lost something from editing on two devices at the same time and then syncing both, but regardless, it's wonderful and I use it for just about all my digital note taking. Update 2018: still love it

I love this app! Easy to make notes or checklists (hello, supermarket), you can color code them, title them and sort them any way you like! The only thing I wish it had were folders, or some sort of way to organize my notes. I have been using it for so long and I have so many notes now that an organization feature would be incredibly helpful. Other than that, it's great!

I have multiple note apps, but I find myself using this app most often. I love being able to simply jot down any random thought and color code notes for different topics. The checklist functions are good too (items are movable, can be crossed off), but it would be great if there was a way to color code items in the checklist. Also, it would be helpful if I were able to move the notes themselves instead of having the most recently viewed on top. Though simplicity is what draws me to Color Note, I can't help but imagine extra features to visually organize notes- like folders...

This is definitely my favourite app. If you're a fellow 'obsessive' list maker, this is for you! By saving to my SD card, I've been able to easily move all my notes over to each new phone. I also take full advantage of the different colours by titling each with a different theme, which makes it easier to find older notes! It can be used to organise thoughts, keep track of items  and  collections, to cut  and  paste text from messages, emails,  and  online, or even just like a sticky-note, to write a quick message for later. Most useful ( and  used) app ever!

I have been using color note for about 1 1/2 years now and I have been pleased with all it's functions. It would be nice though if it had folders so you don't have a long list of all your items combined. I use it to track my workouts as well as a grocery list and every thing in between. This is the app to have. Adding on to this review 5 years later. I'm still using colornote. I've tried some other note apps that promise all kinds of great print andfile features only to find them full of errors and not really doing what I thought they would. So this is always my favorite and reliable note app.

I use this app everyday. It really does help me. I'm the type of guy that if I don't write something down like a task or an appointment or even research notes at that very moment I'll forget with my busy lifestyle. I'm sure there are better ways to keep organized but I'm A.D.H.D and this works for me because it's so fast and easy. I use it to quickly jot down what I need to at the moment and then when I have time I go back and expound on a subject or simplify or transfer the note to a calendar or whatever other organizational tools I use. I absolutely love it! I don't know what I would do without it. It saved my life! Thank you app makers across the world for all your help and support and hard work!

So useful. I have multiple lists for shopping, to-do, etc., plus I use it whenever somebody gives me information - instead of writing it down on a paper that might get lost, I just add a short color note. And here's a quick tip: if you sort your notes alphabetically but there are one or two notes you want to stay at the top of the list, just begin the note title with a special characters like *or + and it will automatically sort to the top of the list.

I've used this app on three different phones. I tried grocery list apps and still found myself coming back to this app. I love the ability to add a sticky note your home screen. I would forget so many things if I didn't use Colornote to remind me! It's also great to jot down notes and thoughts before going into a meeting. That way you don't forget to cover the things you want.

I've used this app for a long time. I originally ran this on Kindle, then on Android and now use it on Windows as well. The tools are relatively basic but they work very well. I would love an easier way to manage the checklists but for simple lists it is more than enough. Generally the simplicity of the interface, ease of use, and cross platform functionality makes it my go to tool for jotting down ideas, urgent info, and even short stories. Highly recommended!

I've used this app since about 2013 and is probably "THE" most important and used app I own. I'm not saying that this is the best memo app on the market but I am saying that it's been the best for me. Features like checklists and reminders are things I use daily. I also like the syncing options like if I had to jot something down while using my tablet , when l press sync on my phone its there as well. I only wish that it would let me upload pics as well!

I haven't updated in almost 4 years, still works awesome never have an issue with backups or loading data into a new phone. Very handy app. I have swapped out phones, used it on many different type of android phones and it has always backed up my information on the new device. It has a lot of useable features. Now if only they could make it so we could put sub folders in folders to clean thing up and organize things a bit better. But it is good I have no issues with this app at all.

One *star only because constant Crashes in Windows 10 - worked before. List view is missing In WIN 10 (when it works). Android 3* stars. Wishes: 1) Add todays date. Easiest with a double click on empty space. 2) Delete Backups - Change to delete all but the two latest. 3) When there are many notes to delete, let us have checkboxes and than delete those marked with one click for all. Is there any one of the developers ever reading these comments ?

I am very forgetful, and I tell everyone if it's not on my calendar it's not happening. This app makes it so easy to make a quick note or list that I can pin to my homescreen so I can keep up with it! The calendar is so much easier to use than Google or some of the other apps. It is pinned to my homescreen and it sends notifications for each event. If I could change anything, I would make it sync with Google or Facebook so I could keep up with events I forget to put on my calendar.

Longtime user here, TOTALLY useful app. I especially love the checklist feature. I use it as a grocery list. All my commonly bought items are listed  and  if I buy them I check them off. They stay though so later, if I need milk again I uncheck my previously checked off 'Milk' note. I open it up @ the grocery store  and  as I put stuff into my cart, check, check. You're with me all day ColorNotes.

I have a terrible memory because of a health condition that effects my brain. This app has made a huge difference in my life. It's easy to use, easy to find, and has no ads so nothing to disrupt my chain of thought. I use it for everything from karaoke list and places friends recommend to things my kids ask for for their birthday and important questions to ask my doctor's. A+ for sure!

I started using this app two months ago, I really like it - convenient and easy to use. Edit: I noticed one thing, I want some tasks to be repeated daily - but if I finish the task, it will disappear from every day in the calendar. It will be better, if it disappears only from the day I did the task. For example, I want this app to remind me to drink 6 glasses of water every day. If I finish today, it will be checked, but tomorrow I will still have this task on my calendar.

I need lists to organize myself. This has lists where you can tick off items, or notes where i can record reminders. You can customize it a lot, and it is EXTREMELY convenient, super simple to use, you can email or send items to yourself or others AND it syncs with your email so should you lose/break your device you can retrieve your lists. Great for a novelist like myself or snyone who needs to free up some brainspace.

I love being organized. I always thought I couldn't get any better at it when I found this app. It's so easy to use and the color coding helps in various day to day tasks. My personal favorite is the checklist, which makes sure I don't forget a thing. I also like the feature that pins the tasks to the notification bar. Thanks, ColorNote!

This is an amazing app. It allows you to take so many notes, there's no limit to the pages and you can use as many pages as you like. There's also an extremely helpful checklist where you can write whatever you need! What I really like about this app is that there are no ads at all! There are so many different things you can do on this app, heck, you can even write an entire story! Anything! It helps you be very organised and there is nothing you have to pah for unlike other apps! It is exceedingly phenomenal!

Definitely user-friendly. Plenty of options and abilities without it being overwhelming or time consuming to use. I use this daily for many different things from a daily to-do list to shopping lists for different stores to notes for work. Having the 9 color tabs is a quick and easy wat to separate personal, professional, home, pets etc and also the option of a bullet list or memo pad is convenient, depending on what you need to notate. I have one on my phone and sync it to the one on my Kindle and it's awesome. Can't go a day without it!

So perfect for keeping little files of things to do, plus where spent MO ey, plus movies I want to watch, plus anything I want to remember, xmas lists etc. And it has a feature where I can share it via email or message text. It's the coolest thing. Have used for 2 years now and don't know what I'd do without it.

Super easy to use and is always there for my moments of inspiration. The locking feature is really useful to keep others out of your thoughts and the option to change colour of your notes is good for organising them into categories. This is the best notes app I've ever used and I wouldn't use another notes app again. 100% recommend this.

It is THE BEST notes app on android, closely followed by Google Keep (wish Google Keep could highlight text searches within notes) I have series of notes in my phone and the highlight text function makes it easier for me to search for a particular phrase or clause. It is simply the best notes taking app for me and it is AD-FREE!!! OMG!!! MY NOTES APP FOR YEARS AND YEARS TO COME TILL DEATH DO US PART!

This review is long over due. I have been using ColorNote since it first came out in the app store. This app keeps me well organized for both home and work use. I also like that you can transfer all your notes to a new phone hassle-free. I would definitely recommend this app!

Great App. Wish it had Windows 7 version rather than importing/exporting on the PC, but can't complain at all. I've read the privacy policy but more info on the encryption of data to, from and on servers would be reassuring. One of the very best free/low-cost apps, and a key addition to my phone and tablet; an example to others. For reviewers here dropping stars and asking about stuff like passwords, fonts, colors, etc, it's in the menus and docs! Website and email contact of dev is in the info...

This app has changed my life -- it's so much more organized! I've been using it for several years and use it daily for reminders, grocery lists, goals, etc. I love the minimalist and clean design versus other planners out there, as well as how easy it is to edit and move around items (in the case you're using the checklist style note). My only suggested improvement of the app would be to include an alert window (to ask you to confirm) when you select to delete an item on a checklist note when you're in edit mode. I've accidentally deleted items I wanted to keep by mistakenly tapping the "X" button while scrolling. I hope this app stays around for a very long time!

It's a simple, easy, very useful app. And it's free. What more can you want. Later, after using it for a while---It has one huge flaw. if you open it, say while shopping, then put it in your pocket, it will bury your notes in lines of random letters. Locking it doesn't prevent this. There needs a way to block input and changes when you want to.

I loved this app. I use it all the time. Unfortunately when I changed phones none of my notes backed up, even though I had my information set up to store all of my notes. I contacted the developer of the app about it... And didn't even get a response. So don't hold your breath about back up, but it you need things for grocery lists and such, it's good for that. Just don't put info you'll need long term.
